overview: A compilation of five short stories, created especially for women and couples. The movie presents five modern, urban, spicy and explicit stories, where the sex takes place in a natural and realistic way. "Something About Nadia" ("Nadia y las Mujeres") is about the power of attraction of beautiful brunette on other women. In "jodetecarlos.com" a soccer player cheats on his wife, who plans an exquisite and creative revenge.  "Married With Children" ("Casados con Hijos") is a story about a couple trying to combine everyday life with an exciting sex life.  In "The Good Girl" ("Ser o No Ser Una Buena Chica") we witness the evolution of a typical good girl to a more liberated spirit, and in "Breakup Sex" ("Te Amo, Te Odio") two gay men meet for their last sexual encounter.
title: Five Hot Stories for Her
